channel.title: [718] NPC dialogue faces on custom npcs
channel.description:
718. Hi, I have got this problem with the Custom NPC I have used. Whenever I talk to him and his face shows up during the dialogue, it is all glitched and stuff. http://gyazo.com/2db1dc586398bb1a6c9dbca601c49a50
Is there any way I can fix that, so it will show the NPC's head properly? Thanks in advance
